content.text:
# Edward J. Montagne

Edward J. Montagne (1885â€“1932) was a British screenwriter who worked in the American film industry during the silent era. He worked for Vitagraph for six years, eventually being poached by Selznick Pictures, and later working for Universal Pictures. He was the father of the producer and director Edward Montagne.

* The Conflict (1916)
